name: Digit Classification
desc: Utilized a Convolutional Neural Network for classify digits by largest area. With hyper-parameter tuning, checkpoint ensemble, and Majority Voting ensemble we were able to achieve a 96.3% accuracy

name: Power of Linear Classifiers
desc: Utilized Linear Baseline Models to outperform more complex CNNs on text understanding tasks. We beat the temporal CNN proposed by New York University's Zhang and LeCun on 4 of the 6 datasets.
libraries: Vowpal Wabbit, Sklearn, NLTK, Numpy, Pandas

name: CA Automation
desc: Automate the country assignment process for Model United Nations. This will be embedded in the SSUNS.org website, so the conference can automate this process every year and will have a web interface to do so
